離.definition: to leave; to part from; to be away from; (in giving distances) from; without (sth); independent of; one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire; ☲

離世.definition: (archaic) to live in seclusion; to pass away

離亂.definition: social upheaval caused by war or famine etc

離任.definition: to leave office; to leave one's post

離休.definition: to retire; to leave work and rest (euphemism for compulsory retirement of old cadres)

離別.definition: to leave (on a long journey); to part from sb

離合.definition: clutch (in car gearbox); separation and reunion

離場.definition: to leave the venue; (of an athlete) to leave the field; (of an investor) to exit the market; (of an aircraft) to depart

離家出走.definition: to leave home (to live somewhere else)

離家別井.definition: to leave home; to abandon one's family

離島區.definition: Islands District of the New Territories, Hong Kong

離心.definition: to be at odds with; centrifugal (force)

離散.definition: (of family members) separated from one another; scattered about; dispersed; (math.) discrete

離石.definition: Lishi district of Lüliang city 呂梁市|吕梁市[Lu:3 liang2 shi4], Shanxi 山西

離石區.definition: Lishi district of Lüliang city 呂梁市|吕梁市[Lu:3 liang2 shi4], Shanxi 山西

離經叛道.definition: to rebel against orthodoxy; to depart from established practices

離職.definition: to leave one's job temporarily (e.g. for study); to leave one's job; to resign

離苦得樂.definition: to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)

離譜兒.definition: erhua variant of 離譜|离谱[li2pu3]

離鄉背井.definition: to leave one's homeplace (to find work, flee disaster etc)

離開人世.definition: to die; to leave this world

離間.definition: to drive a wedge between (allies, partners etc)

離題.definition: to digress; to stray from the subject

離騷.definition: On Encountering Sorrow, poem by Qu Yuan 屈原[Qu1 Yuan2] in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞[Chu3 ci2]
